forecastPackage_basic_explanation: For general purposes, contains the most common weather variables
forecastPackage_current_explanation: Current weather information, including observations and measurements
forecastPackage_clouds_explanation: Detailed cloud layer and sunshine duration forecasts
forecastPackage_sunAndMoon_explanation: Information about rising and setting times of sun and moon
forecastPackage_agro_explanation: For agricultural purposes, contains soil and vegetation related weather variables
forecastPackage_agromodelLeafWetness_exp: Relevant information for monitoring and forecasting leaf wetness
forecastPackage_agromodelSowing_explanat: Information about suitable time windows for sowing crops
forecastPackage_agromodelSpray_explanati: Information about suitable time windows for spaying fields
latlongFromSystem: use latitude and longitude from system settings
tempunitFromSystem: use temperature unit from system settings
applicationKeyHint: Get meteoblue non-commercial API service here. View your personal API-Key here.
application_explanation: For non-commercial uses, meteoblue.com offers the meteogram 5 days and the data package basic-day.
application_link: A description of the values can be found here.
